text: Aur jo kuch Allah Taalaa ney tujhay dey rakha hai uss mein say aakhirat kay ghar ki talash bhi rakh aur apnay dunyawi hissay ko bhi na bhool aur jesay Allah ney teray sath ehsan kiya hai tu bhi acha salook ker aur mulk mein fasad ka khuwan na ho yaqeen maan kay Allah mufsidon ko na pasand rakhta hai
